author: oysteing
msg: DERBY-3447: Shutdown on a database without stopping replication hangs
- Set replication threads to be daemon threads.

author: hermanns
msg: o adding default-class-ref to struts-default.xml to make showcase working again

author: ajaquith
msg: Re-factored the authentication subsystem to remove the need for JAAS configuration files. WEB-INF/jspwiki.jaas goes away, as does the need for PolicyLoader. Also, responsibilities for web authentication move to WikiServletFilter. Authentication is now configured via jspwiki.properties -- see that file for details. WikiSession API change: getLoginContext() vanishes.

author: reinhard
msg: refactor Sitemap-specific Invocation so that the pipeline API doesn't need it (source resolving still needs to be moved to JNet)
